WelcomeScreen.head: Hello, {name}
WelcomeScreen.body: Welcome to Prima! Before starting, please fill in some important information below. Click the button below to get started.

Finish.head: All done!
Finish.body: Don't worry. If you intend to change the information you have already entered, you can change it later.

Container.header: Please complete all steps before using the application.

Tnc.tnc_head: Please read following terms and conditions carefully
Tnc.tnc_content:
Terms and Conditions

Welcome to [Your Company Name]!

These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of [Your Company Name]'s Website, located at [Website URL].

1. Introduction

By accessing this website we assume you accept these terms and conditions. Do not continue to use [Website Name] if you do not agree to take all of the terms and conditions stated on this page.

2. Cookies

We employ the use of cookies. By accessing [Website Name], you agreed to use cookies in agreement with the [Your Company Name]'s Privacy Policy.

3. License

Unless otherwise stated, [Your Company Name] and/or its licensors own the intellectual property rights for all material on [Website Name]. All intellectual property rights are reserved. You may access this from [Website Name] for your own personal use subjected to restrictions set in these terms and conditions.

4. User Comments

This Agreement shall begin on the date hereof.

Parts of this website offer an opportunity for users to post and exchange opinions and information in certain areas of the website. [Your Company Name] does not filter, edit, publish or review Comments prior to their presence on the website. Comments do not reflect the views and opinions of [Your Company Name], its agents and/or affiliates. Comments reflect the views and opinions of the person who post their views and opinions. To the extent permitted by applicable laws, [Your Company Name] shall not be liable for the Comments or for any liability, damages or expenses caused and/or suffered as a result of any use of and/or posting of and/or appearance of the Comments on this website.

5. Hyperlinking to our Content

The following organizations may link to our Website without prior written approval:

  • Government agencies;
  • Search engines;
  • News organizations;
  • Online directory distributors may link to our Website in the same manner as they hyperlink to the Websites of other listed businesses; and
  • System wide Accredited Businesses except soliciting non-profit organizations, charity shopping malls, and charity fundraising groups which may not hyperlink to our Web site.

6. iFrames

Without prior approval and written permission, you may not create frames around our Webpages that alter in any way the visual presentation or appearance of our Website.

7. Content Liability

We shall not be hold responsible for any content that appears on your Website. You agree to protect and defend us against all claims that is rising on your Website. No link(s) should appear on any Website that may be interpreted as libelous, obscene or criminal, or which infringes, otherwise violates, or advocates the infringement or other violation of, any third party rights.

8. Your Privacy

Please read Privacy Policy

9. Reservation of Rights

We reserve the right to request that you remove all links or any particular link to our Website. You approve to immediately remove all links to our Website upon request. We also reserve the right to amen these terms and conditions and itâ€™s linking policy at any time. By continuously linking to our Website, you agree to be bound to and follow these linking terms and conditions.

10. Removal of links from our website

If you find any link on our Website that is offensive for any reason, you are free to contact and inform us any moment. We will consider requests to remove links but we are not obligated to or so or to respond to you directly.

11. Disclaimer

To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, we exclude all representations, warranties and conditions relating to our website and the use of this website. Nothing in this disclaimer will:

  • limit or exclude our or your liability for death or personal injury;
  • limit or exclude our or your liability for fraud or fraudulent misrepresentation;
  • limit any of our or your liabilities in any way that is not permitted under applicable law; or
  • exclude any of our or your liabilities that may not be excluded under applicable law.

The limitations and prohibitions of liability set in this Section and elsewhere in this disclaimer: (a) are subject to the preceding paragraph; and (b) govern all liabilities arising under the disclaimer, including liabilities arising in contract, in tort and for breach of statutory duty.

As long as the website and the information and services on the website are provided free of charge, we will not be liable for any loss or damage of any nature.
Tnc.tnc_checkbox: I agree with all terms and conditions

Body.body: List below contains all groups available on your system. You may create a new group or update an existing group.
Body.confirmation_body: Group {group_name} has {users, plural, =0 {no users yet} =1 {one user} other {# users}}. Your action will revoke all access for all users who belong to this group.

Profile.tooltip_submit_image: Use this image as my profile picture

Outlet.currency_desc: Set default currency for this outlet

Add.description_name: The name <bold>cannot be changed</bold> after this product is sold.
Add.description_details: Product details contains a detailed explanation of your product.
Add.description_category_type: If selected, this category will appear only for this product type.
Add.description_category_name: Category names should not be too long and should consist of only one word.
Add.description_label: Keep labels short and unique from one another.
Add.validation_selling_price: Selling price cannot be lower than capital price.
Add.description_images: Maximum images per variant is 6 images. Each image must be less than 3MB in size.
Add.message_success_create: <bold>{name}</bold> has been added and ready for new transaction!
Add.description_batch: <bold>One batch represents the product stock for this variant in one outlet.</bold> If this variant has an expiration time and is only stored in one outlet, it is recommended to create a separate batch even if it is the same outlet.

Import.template_body: Please download the template first and fill in as directed. Then simply drop the file into the dropzone below and wait until the process is finished.
Import.rules_4: The maximum rows per sheet is <emp>{max}</emp>.

Validation.description_name: Product name has to be minimum 8 characters and maximum 255 characters. You are REQUIRED to fill this column.
Validation.description_details: Details of your product. You may leave it blank.
Validation.example_details: The best donut in town. Glazed with a top class sugar.
Validation.description_type: The product type. Only acceptable values are PHYSICAL, VIRTUAL, SUBSCRIPTION, and SERVICE. You are REQUIRED to fill this column. This is a case-sensitive column.
Validation.description_category: The product category. You may leave it blank.
Validation.description_label: The product variant label. The label has to be minimum 8 characters and maximum 255 characters. You are REQUIRED to fill this column IF you decided to add more than one variant.
Validation.description_specifications: The product variant specification. You may leave it blank IF the product only has one variant.
Validation.example_specifications: Get the best donut along with the best nut in town.
Validation.description_stock: The product variant base stock. Value has to be positive numeric only. You are REQUIRED to fill this column.
Validation.description_currency: The product variant currency. Only acceptable values are IDR and USD. You are REQUIRED to fill this column.
Validation.description_capital_price: The product variant base capital price per item. Value has to be positive numeric only. You may leave it blank.
Validation.description_outlet: The batch is available on this outlet. You are REQUIRED to fill this column.
Validation.description_selling_price: The product variant base selling price per item. Value has to be positive numeric only. If the capital price/item is filled, this value has to be higher than capital price/item value. You are REQUIRED to fill this column.
Validation.description_expired_at: The product variant expired date. Only acceptable formats are YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss. You may leave it blank.
Validation.description_is_infinite_stock: Determine if this variant batch is always on stock. Fill it with 'Y' if it is true.

Import.import_error: Import failed! Please check the details.
Import.import_no_rename: Please do not rename the template file.
Import.import_wrong_header: Please do not change the template header/column.
Import.import_duplicate_name: We detected a duplicate product name:
Import.import_validation_errors: Please correct all the following validation errors:
Import.import_max_rows: Total rows in one or more sheets are over 2,000.
Import.import_prepare_inserting: Validation completed. Preparing all data to be inserted into database.
Import.import_inserting_error: There is unexpected error while inserting data
Import.import_success_details: {processed} of {total, plural, =0 {# product} =1 {# product} other {# products}} has been inserted into database.

Errors.err_string: The {attribute} field must be a string.
Errors.err_min: The {attribute} field must be at least {value} characters.
Errors.err_max: The {attribute} field must not be greater than {value} characters.
Errors.err_enum: The {attribute} field is invalid. Please use one of these values: {value}.
Errors.err_array: The {attribute} field must be an array.
Errors.err_variant_string: Variant #{position}: The {attribute} field must be a string.
Errors.err_variant_numeric: Variant #{position}: The {attribute} field must be a number.
Errors.err_variant_max: Variant #{position}: The {attribute} field must not be greater than {value} characters.
Errors.err_variant_gt: Variant #{position}: The {attribute} must be greater than capital price.
Errors.err_variant_enum: Variant #{position}: The {attribute} is invalid. Please use one of these values: {value}.
Errors.err_batch_date: Batch #{position}: The {attribute} field must be a valid date.

Products.subheader: You can see all the products that have been registered in the system and change them according to your business needs.
Products.tooltip_ready_stock: There {count, plural, =0 {are no outlets} =1 {is # outlet} other {are # outlets}} that always ready on stock
Products.modal_disable_body: Do you want to disable this product? A disabled product will not be included in application search engine and transaction cannot be made with it.
Products.modal_enable_body: Do you want to enable this product? An enabled product will be included in application search engine and transaction can be made with it.
Products.warning_active_message: You must leave at least one active {child} for this {parent}.
